TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Path
TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage to make a simple clear path.

TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Dirt road
TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage and tamp dirt to make a somewhat easily traversed dirt road.

TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Stone road
TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage, then cut and place blocks to make an easily traversable stone road.

TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Railroad
TrainsOfTheRim.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage, assemble a stone track bed, arrange railroad ties, and lay steel rails.
